name: Sugar Planet (DEMO)
description:
Get ready for the new game by the title of "Sugar Planet" by me! Beat the game by filling up your sugar meter all the way! Select the song you want to play! There are 3 different songs! 参加しませんか？For windows. I haven't tested any other device or type yet so idk if it will be ok or not. I forgot to add the music when you hit it but that'll be in my future project called "Sugar Planet+"

Q&A:

-My game isn't loading/I have inputted another version of the file into the game, it should be working fine now bc it has been working for me. If not, please contact the creator and describe your issue

-My game keeps crashing/ It should not have crashed, but if it does, you can re-download or report this to @Thatoneplayerlol

-Why is this game short?/This is a demo of the original game which will cost $0.25

-When will the full game release?/I'm going to start working on it soon so I don't really know. All I can say is that it will be done shortly, but be warned, I may be busy so I can't keep my word

Helpful? 👍/👎 in comments
